pullrequest.title: Fix a deadlock when recording and the user presses ctrl-c

content.raw:
When I run gazebo from the command line just by typing "gazebo" and send a control+C, the log file is being finished just fine.

If I launch one of quals (*roslaunch atlas_utils qual_task_4.launch*) and send a control+C in that terminal, the state file is finished with a chunk xml tag and not valid. Did I miss something?
content.html:
When I run gazebo from the command line just by typing "gazebo" and send a control+C, the log file is being finished just fine.

If I launch one of quals (roslaunch atlas_utils qual_task_4.launch) and send a control+C in that terminal, the state file is finished with a chunk xml tag and not valid. Did I miss something?
